Events that occurred on 27 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1916 - J.R.R. Tolkien leaves Ã‰taples, and goes to the Somme front.
1925 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 7.
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 73a.
1953 - Actress Lorri Holt is born.
1972 - Vera Chapman meets J.R.R. Tolkien. He agrees to become The Tolkien Society's Honorary President.
2001 - Artist Tove Jansson dies.
